FAST FOOD RESTAURANT CREW jobs bahrain
Job vacancies in bahrain october 2010 Posted by admin on October 06, 2010 Bahrain , Consultant , Driver , Engineer , Finance , Job Vacancy 2010 , Manager , Office / No Comments ALUMINUM COMPANY URGENTLY REQUIRES
MECHANICAL ENGINEER
Should be able to handle projects and fabrication of aluminum products
ALUMINUM FABRICATORS
With minimum 5 years experience
Apply to: Human Resources
P.O Box: 80324, Bahrain
Fax: 17-590338
VACANCY
Accounting&Auditing Organization for Islamic Financial Institutions (AAOIFI) is looking for:
Administrative Assistant (Male)
Receptionist (Female)
Presentable, with College Degree, good typing and computer skills and Proficiency in both Arabic and English. Wishing to apply for the post, send your CV to: aaoifi@batelco.com.bh Fax no. 17250194
A Five Star Hotel is now looking for the following positions:
• Sales Executive
• F&B Waiters/Waitresses.
• Spa Therapists
• Gym Instructors
• Cooks
Qualifications:
• Minimum 2 years experience in similar field
• Excellent oral&written communication skills
• Positive attitude towards hard working environment
• Dedication to job&Team Player
Candidates who meet the above criteria are invited to send their CV’s to e-mail: personnel@cp-bahrain.com
U.S. Franchise“EZ TAKE OUT BURGER”; established in California since 1969.
Now opening soon in the Middle East. First opening in Bahrain.
Urgently requires the following staff:
• SUPERVISOR
• HANDY MAN
• FAST FOOD RESTAURANT CREW
• CLEANER
• DRIVERS/MOTORBIKE
Candidates with minimum 1 year experience in Fast Food Restaurant. Please apply mentioning the position.
Preferably Bahrainis
Email: recruitment.alsg@yahoo.com
